Key Match Events: Angel Di Maria scored the only goal of the match in the 40th minute, securing a 1-0 victory for Argentina over Ecuador.
Lionel Messi attempted a left-footed shot from a difficult angle and long range on the left, which was high and wide to the right from a direct free kick in the 90'+6' minute.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was a pre-Copa America friendly held in Chicago, Illinois, USA.
The attendance for the match was 51,090 spectators.
